attributes.title: Lannister torturer
attributes.actor: Mark ByattA '''Lannister torturer''' is an unnamed minor character in the Season 2
attributes.link: House Lannister:''For similar articles see Lannister soldier.''Character

sections.Biography:
===[[Season 2]]===
He can be heard torturing Lannister soldiers for information about the murder of Ser [[Amory Lorch]] as [[Arya Stark]] passes the gallows at [[Harrenhal]].<ref>"[[The Prince of Winterfell]]"</ref>
